title: Privacy Policy
subtitle: We care about your privacy and transparent data processing.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.p1: This Privacy Policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and what rights you have. We follow the data-minimization principle and only process information necessary to deliver our services.

data_we_collect.title: Data we collect
data_we_collect.p1: The scope of data depends on how you use the site and the PRG token presale features.

item1.title: Technical data
item1.desc: IP address, browser type, language settings, operating system, device identifiers, and anonymized analytics (e.g., in-app events).

item2.title: Web3 transactional data
item2.desc: Wallet address, on-chain signatures/transaction IDs (e.g., Solana), payment amount and currency, transaction status. We do not store private keys.

item3.title: Voluntary contact data
item3.desc: Email address or social handle if you contact us or subscribe to a newsletter.

how_we_use_data.title: How we use data
how_we_use_data.p1: We process data only for legitimate purposes and in accordance with applicable laws (e.g., GDPR).

list.item1: To operate the service and presale (e.g., handle payments, deliver PRG tokens, verify transactions).
list.item2: To maintain security (abuse prevention, technical logs, error detection).
list.item3: For analytics and product improvement (usage metrics, A/B testing, communication about important changes).

cookies.title: Cookies and similar technologies
cookies.p1: We use essential cookies for site functionality and analytics tools in anonymized mode. You can manage cookie preferences in your browser settings.

data_security.title: Data security
data_security.p1: We apply security practices such as encrypted connections (HTTPS), access controls, and abuse monitoring. Still, no system can guarantee 100% security.

third_parties.title: Sharing with third parties
third_parties.p1: We may rely on trusted providers (e.g., analytics, hosting, payment tools). We share only what is necessary to deliver the services and require our providers to comply with data-protection laws.

your_rights.title: Your rights
your_rights.p1: You have the right to access, rectify, erase, restrict processing, object, and data portability, as well as to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority. We will honor requests within the limits of applicable law and our obligations (e.g., accounting or AML/CFT).

childrens_privacy.title: Children’s privacy
childrens_privacy.p1: Our services are not directed to individuals under the age of 13 (or higher, as required by local laws). We do not knowingly collect children’s data.

contact.title: Contact
contact.p1: For privacy matters, contact us at {{email}}. We will do our best to respond promptly.
